metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8366 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The strescape function in ec_strings.c in Ettercap 0.8.2 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow andapplication crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a craftedfilter that is mishandled by etterfilter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8366` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ettercap-common - 1:0.8.2-2ubuntu1.16.04.1
ettercap-graphical - 1:0.8.2-2ubuntu1.16.04.1
ettercap-text-only - 1:0.8.2-2ubuntu1.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ettercap package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:0.8.2-2ubuntu1.16.04.1').
